Headline: #15 Jeffery Local Temporary Reroute near 51st/St. Lawerence
ShortDescription: 15 Jeffery Local buses temp. rerouted SB: St. Lawerence, 47th, Cottage Gr. and 51st; NB 51st, Champlain. 47th and King Dr.: near 51st/St. Lawerence.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#15 Jeffery Local buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions near 51st/St. Lawerence, due to street blockage near 51st/St. Lawerence.

Southbound buses will operate via  51st, St. Lawrence, 47th and Cottage Grove including the normal route streets at the beginning and end.

Northbound buses will operate via 51st, Champlain, 47th and King Drive.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Brown Line Service Experiencing Significant Delays Due to Raised Bridge
ShortDescription: Brown Line service is experiencing delays due to a raised bridge at the Chicago River, downtown.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Brown Line service is experiencing delays due to a raised bridge at the Chicago River, downtown.

Some trains may be either held or rerouted before reaching the bridge (in order to maintain service across the remainder of the route).

Listen for announcements and check train destination signs when boarding.

We apologize for this temporary inconvenience and appreciate your patience while the Chicago Department of Transportation works to complete the bridge operation.

Allow extra travel time.
